responses.rationale: Describes a potential capability ('bodies wouldn't necessarily be totally defenseless') without active reassurance.
Describes experimental findings related to potential capability ('didn't get as sick') without active reassurance.
Describes a limitation of research/capability ('hasn't tested this') without active reassurance.
Describes a potential capability ('memory cells... might recognize parts... and respond') without active reassurance.
Describes a future possibility/recommendation ('vaccination would still be important to tune up our immunity') without active reassurance.
Describes preparedness/capability ('US has vaccines', 'doses are being "filled and finished" so they would be ready') without active reassurance.
Describes preparedness/capability ('Finland has already ordered 20,000 doses', 'will be used... to protect workers') without active reassurance.
Contains a Q5 Reassuring cue ('risk to the general public from H5N1 is low').
Describes preparedness/safeguards ('made that protective equipment available', 'made additional funding available') without active reassurance.

Describes capability/development ('working on the development of a rapid test') without active reassurance.
